languages.text: Существо восстанавливает {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}, получает возможность совершать дополнительную атаку за {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} и +50% к шансу критического {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадания{/g}.
languages.original_text: The creature recovers all {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, gains an additional attack per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, and +50% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}.

languages.text: The creature recovers all {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, gains an additional attack per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, and +50% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}.

traits.locale_text: The creature recovers all MP, gains an additional attack per turn, and +50% critical hit chance.

traits.locale_text: La criatura recupera todos sus {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g}, gana un ataque adicional por {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} y +50 % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}probabilidad de impacto{/g} crítico.

languages.text: 此生物恢复所有{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，每{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}获得一次额外攻击机会，{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}暴击率{/g}提高50%。
languages.original_text: The creature recovers all {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, gains an additional attack per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, and +50% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 此生物恢复所有{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，每{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}获得一次额外攻击机会，{g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}暴击率{/g}提高50%。

languages.text: その生物は全{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}を回復し、{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}ごとの追加攻撃と、+50%のクリティカル{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}ヒット率{/g}を得る。
languages.original_text: The creature recovers all {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, gains an additional attack per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, and +50% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}.

traits.locale_text: その生物は全{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}を回復し、{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}ごとの追加攻撃と、+50%のクリティカル{g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}ヒット率{/g}を得る。

languages.text: Die Kreatur erhält alle {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} zurück, einen zusätzlichen Angriff pro {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g}, sowie +50 % {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}kritische Trefferchance{/g}.
languages.original_text: The creature recovers all {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, gains an additional attack per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, and +50% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Die Kreatur erlangt alle {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} zurück, erhält einen zusätzlichen Angriff pro {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g}, sowie +50 % {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}kritische Trefferchance{/g}.

languages.text: La créature récupère tous ses {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g}, obtient une attaque supplémentaire par {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, et bénéficie de +50 % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}chances de coup{/g} critique.

languages.text: Yaratık, tüm {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP{/g}'sini tazeler. Her {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turda{/g} ilave bir saldırı ve +%50 kritik {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vuruş olasılığı{/g} kazanır.
